DOC.brief_summary: To document pre-diagnosis educational abilities, to document any change in educational achievements following treatment, to document educational support given within the statement process and to document the timing of support.
DOC.brief_title: Educational Follow-up in a Cohort of Children at the Royal Marsden Hospital (RMH)
DOC.detailed_description: This will be a retrospective study. Cases will be identified by looking at the Royal Marsden Hospital (RMH) coding database. All the patients will have completed treatment for a brain tumour. The children all need to have started school before the diagnosis of their brain tumour so that we can look at easily defined educational assessments in this cohort. Children will be identified by looking at RMH coding of diagnosis and include children aged between 4 years and 18 years old (school age).
DOC.criteria: patients/parental consent for RMH accessing educational information from them and their school patients with a primary brain tumour children with secondary brain tumours children who have had treatment for a relapse of primary brain tumour
